description: A playful twist on Valentine's tradition in Japan with a pun on choosing chocolates.
title: Sweet Selection
n_1: Emi and Masa browse a chocolate store in Tokyo.
c1_1: Look at all these choices, Masa!
c2_1: Each one is a sweet statement, Emi.
n_2: Emi holds up a heart-shaped chocolate.
n_3: They laugh, enjoying the pun-filled moment.
c2_3: Indeed, sweet choices make it special.
n_4: With chocolates in hand, they feel the love.
c1_4: I choo-choose you every day, Masa!
